prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon with a round, crystalline body and a cheerful expression.
I want a small, icy creature that resembles a snowflake and has bright, expressive eyes.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the chill of winter, with a frosty blue color and a playful stance.
Make a cute, ice-themed Pokemon with sparkling features and an innocent personality.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon made of ice shards, with a bubbly demeanor and two distinct eyes.
Design an adorable, snow-like Pokemon that can blend into its icy surroundings and has a friendly vibe.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a frozen gem, with unique icy traits and a whimsical charm.
